import React from 'react' import styles from './Messages.module.css' import DialogItem from '../DialogItem/DialogItem' import MessageItem from '../MessageItem/MessageItem' const Messages = (props) => { let newMessage = React.createRef(); debugger; let messageItems = props.Messages.messagesData.map( item => ) let dialogItems = props.Messages.dialogItemsData.map((item) =>) return
{messageItems}
{dialogItems}
} export default Messages;
